channel.title: Fatal Error
channel.description:
when i run my source and start up my client, it gets to unpacking interfaces and gets this fatal error. [code]Exception in thread "Image Fetcher 2" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError at java.util.zip.Inflater.init(Native Method) at java.util.zip.Inflater.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.Inflater.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.PNGImageDecoder.produceImage(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.InputStreamImageSource.doFetch(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.fetchloop(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.run(Unknown Source) Uncaught error fetching image: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException at java.lang.System.arraycopy(Native Method) at java.awt.image.PixelGrabber.setPixels(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.ImageDecoder.setPixels(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.PNGImageDecoder.sendPixels(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.PNGImageDecoder.produceImage(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.InputStreamImageSource.doFetch(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.fetchloop(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.OutOfMemoryError Exception in thread "Image Fetcher 3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError at java.util.zip.Inflater.init(Native Method) at java.util.zip.Inflater.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.Inflater.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.PNGImageDecoder.produceImage(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.InputStreamImageSource.doFetch(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.fetchloop(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.OutOfMemoryError java.lang.OutOfMemoryError Exception in thread "Image Fetcher 0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError at java.util.zip.Inflater.init(Native Method) at java.util.zip.Inflater.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.Inflater.<init>(Unknown Source) java.lang.OutOfMemoryError at sun.awt.image.PNGImageDecoder.produceImage(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.InputStreamImageSource.doFetch(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.fetchloop(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.run(Unknown Source) Exception in thread "Image Fetcher 1" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError # at java.util.zip.Inflater.init(Native Method) at java.util.zip.Inflater.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.Inflater.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.PNGImageDecoder.produceImage(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.InputStreamImageSource.doFetch(Unknown Source) # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.fetchloop(Unknown Source)#
# java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: requested 32756 bytes for ChunkPool::allocate. Out of swap space? # at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.run(Unknown Source) # Internal Error[thread 7816 also had an error] (allocation.cpp:166), pid=4968, tid=5788 # Error: ChunkPool::allocate # # JRE version: 6.0_24-b07 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (19.1-b02 mixed mode windows-x86 ) # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\nreimherr\Desktop\RuneFXwebclient\hs_err_pid4968.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . .[/code] i just tried to add korasi but im not sure if that is why or not, i haven't compiled/ran the client folder in a while because i have been using a webclient

item.title: Fatal Error
item.dc:creator: @RedFalconBlue RedFalconBlue
item.description:
@RedFalconBlue wrote:

when i run my source and start up my client, it gets to unpacking interfaces and gets this fatal error.

[code]Exception in thread “Image Fetcher 2” java.lang.OutOfMemoryError
at java.util.zip.Inflater.init(Native Method)
at java.util.zip.Inflater.(Unknown Source)
at java.util.zip.Inflater.(Unknown Source)
at sun.awt.image.PNGImageDecoder.produceImage(Unknown Source)
at sun.awt.image.InputStreamImageSource.doFetch(Unknown Source)
at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.fetchloop(Unknown Source)
at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.run(Unknown Source)
Uncaught error fetching image:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
at java.lang.System.arraycopy(Native Method)
at java.awt.image.PixelGrabber.setPixels(Unknown Source)
at sun.awt.image.ImageDecoder.setPixels(Unknown Source)
at sun.awt.image.PNGImageDecoder.sendPixels(Unknown Source)
at sun.awt.image.PNGImageDecoder.produceImage(Unknown Source)
at sun.awt.image.InputStreamImageSource.doFetch(Unknown Source)
at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.fetchloop(Unknown Source)
at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.run(Unknown Source)
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError
Exception in thread “Image Fetcher 3” java.lang.OutOfMemoryError
at java.util.zip.Inflater.init(Native Method)
at java.util.zip.Inflater.(Unknown Source)
at java.util.zip.Inflater.(Unknown Source)
at sun.awt.image.PNGImageDecoder.produceImage(Unknown Source)
at sun.awt.image.InputStreamImageSource.doFetch(Unknown Source)
at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.fetchloop(Unknown Source)
at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.run(Unknown Source)
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError
Exception in thread “Image Fetcher 0” java.lang.OutOfMemoryError
at java.util.zip.Inflater.init(Native Method)
at java.util.zip.Inflater.(Unknown Source)
at java.util.zip.Inflater.(Unknown Source)
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError
at sun.awt.image.PNGImageDecoder.produceImage(Unknown Source)
at sun.awt.image.InputStreamImageSource.doFetch(Unknown Source)
at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.fetchloop(Unknown Source)
at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.run(Unknown Source)
Exception in thread “Image Fetcher 1” java.lang.OutOfMemoryError

    at java.util.zip.Inflater.init(Native Method)
    at java.util.zip.Inflater.<init>(Unknown Source)
    at java.util.zip.Inflater.<init>(Unknown Source)
    at sun.awt.image.PNGImageDecoder.produceImage(Unknown Source)
    at sun.awt.image.InputStreamImageSource.doFetch(Unknown Source)

A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:

    at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.fetchloop(Unknown Source)#

java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: requested 32756 bytes for ChunkPool::allocate. Out

of swap space?

    at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.run(Unknown Source)

Internal Error[thread 7816 also had an error]

(allocation.cpp:166), pid=4968, tid=5788

Error: ChunkPool::allocate

JRE version: 6.0_24-b07

Java VM: Java HotSpot™ Client VM (19.1-b02 mixed mode windows-x86 )

An error report file with more information is saved as:

C:\Users\nreimherr\Desktop\RuneFXwebclient\hs_err_pid4968.log

If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:

http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp

Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
i just tried to add korasi but im not sure if that is why or not, i haven’t compiled/ran the client folder in a while because i have been using a webclient
